articles.description: Jacob Bethell will bat at number three on his Test debut in England's series opener against New Zealand in Christchurch on Thursday.
articles.title: England in New Zealand: Jacob Bethell to bat at three on Test debut

articles.description: US car giant General Motors reaches an agreement in principle to enter Formula 1 in 2026 with its Cadillac brand.
articles.title: Formula 1: General Motors agrees in principle to enter F1 in 2026 with Cadillac brand

articles.description: Mohamed Salah is "selfish" for publicly expressing his disappointment at Liverpool's failure to offer him a new contract, says former Reds defender Jamie Carragher.
articles.title: Mohamed Salah contract: Jamie Carragher says Liverpool forward 'selfish' for comments

articles.description: Could West Ham's win and 'huge result' at Newcastle be the turning point for manager Julen Lopetegui's reign?
articles.title: Could Newcastle win be turning point for Lopetegui at West Ham?

articles.description: Liverpool are eight points clear at the top, but below them just one point separates second to fifth in what appears an open race to finish in the European spots.
articles.title: Is this the most open the Premier League has ever been?

articles.description: England batter Joe Root needs to score a century in Australia to be considered an all-time great, says Darren Lehmann.
articles.title: Joe Root 'a rung below' Smith and Kohli, says Darren Lehmann

articles.description: Vinicius Jr is doubtful for Real Madrid's Champions League match against Liverpool because of a hamstring injury.
articles.title: Vinicius Jr injured before Real Madrid match against Liverpool

articles.description: How Australia cricket is still affected - and will continue to be so - by the death of Phillip Hughes 10 years ago.
articles.title: Phillip Hughes: Australia batter remembered 10 years on

articles.description: A depressing revamp of the LPGA Tour's season-ending tournament resulted in an inappropriately low-key finish for Lexi Thompson, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Lexi Thompson justifiably angry at low-key finish to full-time LPGA Tour career

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Maddison, Salah, Cunha, Jackson
